mapper.select: INSERT INTO Statistics_tbl(statistics_id, stPageName, stUrlScheme, stUrlHost, stUrlPort, stUrlLocalPath, stQueryString, stUrlPathAndQuery, stPrePageName, stUrlReferrerHost, stUrlReferrer, stSessionId, stUserHostAddress, stUserAgent, stInsertDt) Values(#{statistics_id}, #{stPageName}, #{stUrlScheme}, #{stUrlHost}, #{stUrlPort}, #{stUrlLocalPath}, #{stQueryString}, #{stUrlPathAndQuery}, #{stPrePageName}, #{stUrlReferrerHost}, #{stUrlReferrer}, #{stSessionId}, #{stUserHostAddress}, #{stUserAgent}, now())

INSERT INTO StatisticsLog_tbl(statistics_id, slStatLogDt, slPageName, slUrlHost, slUrlLocalPath, slQueryString, stInsertDt) Values(#{statistics_id}, now(6), #{slPageName}, #{slUrlHost}, #{slUrlLocalPath}, #{slQueryString}, now())

INSERT INTO StatisticsLog_tbl(statistics_id, slStatLogDt, slPageName, slUrlHost, slUrlLocalPath, slQueryString, stInsertDt) Values(#{statistics_id}, DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 1 SECOND), #{slPageName}, #{slUrlHost}, #{slUrlLocalPath}, #{slQueryString}, now())
mapper.update: update Statistics_tbl set stClientScreen=#{stClientScreen} where statistics_id = #{statistics_id}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(max(statistics_id+1) , 1000000000) AS statistics_id from Statistics_tbl
